system.availability: Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement. When consumed, gain +20 Strength for duration. Afterwards gain 1 Fatigue and make -10 Strength Test or suffer 1d10 Strength Damage for a day or until another dose is taken. Lasts 50+2d10 Minutes, causes 1d5 Corruption. Can only use one Eldar Drug at a time.
system.cost: Non-Eldar make -20 Toughness Test or are stunned for 1d5 Rounds, if 4+ DoF also take 1d10 Damage (ignore armour+toughness). Eldar make test if taking multiple Eldar drugs.
